name: weather_hurricane_simulation_agent
description: An agent that analyzes hurricane satellite images using Gemini Vision API to extract metadata and generate evacuation priorities for high-risk locations based on historical flood data.

skills.name: Analyze Hurricane Image
skills.description: Extract hurricane metadata from satellite images including category, affected states, and geographic bounding box using Gemini Vision API.

skills.name: Calculate Evacuation Priority
skills.description: Generate prioritized evacuation locations based on historical flood risk data and population vulnerability.

skills.name: Query Flood Risk Data
skills.description: Access historical flood event data across multiple states from BigQuery to identify high-risk areas.

skills.name: Generate Evacuation Plan
skills.description: Create comprehensive evacuation plans with top 20 high-risk locations and actionable recommendations.
